```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

##Make some vectors!!!

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")


#check the class!! Do this often
class(marmots)

##another vector

pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 5)

## check the class!!

class(pika)

# Scalar multiplier
scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika
scalar_pika
```
